presentation.title: 1. Website Presentation
presentation.content: In accordance with Article 6 of Law No. 2004-575 of June 21, 2004, for confidence in the digital economy, users of the site are informed of the identity of the various parties involved in its implementation and monitoring:
presentation.details:
Owner: Changrui ZHANG
Contact: Via contact form or LinkedIn.
Hosting: Personal Server / Private Cloud.

cgu.title: 2. General Conditions of Use
cgu.content_1: Use of the site implies full and complete acceptance of the general conditions of use described below. These conditions of use may be modified or supplemented at any time.
cgu.content_2: This site is normally accessible to users at all times. An interruption for technical maintenance may be decided by the owner.

services.title: 3. Description of Services Provided
services.content: The purpose of the site is to provide information regarding all of the owner's activities (Portfolio, CV, Projects). The owner strives to provide information on the site that is as accurate as possible.

intellectual.title: 4. Intellectual Property
intellectual.content_1: Changrui ZHANG is the owner of the intellectual property rights or holds the usage rights on all elements accessible on the site.
intellectual.content_2: Any reproduction, representation, modification, publication, adaptation of all or part of the elements of the site is prohibited, unless prior written permission is obtained.

liability.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: The owner cannot be held responsible for direct and indirect damage caused to the user's equipment when accessing the site.

data.title: 6. Personal Data Management
data.content_1: The site collects personal information relating to the user only for the need of certain services proposed by the site (ex: game leaderboards, messages).
data.content_2: In accordance with the provisions of the law relative to data processing, files and liberties, any user has a right of access, rectification and opposition to personal data concerning them.

collection.title: 1. Information Collection
collection.content_1: We collect information when you register on our site, log in to your account, participate in a game, and/or log out.
collection.content_2: In addition, we automatically receive and record information from your computer and browser, including your IP address, software and hardware, and the page you request.

usage.title: 2. Information Usage
usage.content: Any information we collect from you may be used to:
list: Personalize your experience and meet your individual needs
Improve customer service and your support needs
Administer a contest, promotion, or survey

ecommerce.title: 3.  Online Commerce Privacy
ecommerce.content: We are the sole owners of the information collected on this site. Your personal information will not be sold, exchanged, transferred, or given to any other company for any reason, without your consent.

disclosure.title: 4. Third Party Disclosure
disclosure.content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer to outside parties your personally identifiable information. This does not include trusted third parties who assist us in operating our website.

security.title: 5. Information Protection
security.content: We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information. We use state-of-the-art encryption to protect sensitive information transmitted online.

consent.title: 6. Consent
consent.content: By using our site, you consent to our privacy policy.

cv.profile_text: Back-end developer with a Master's in Computer Science (Sorbonne University), experienced in Spring Boot and ReactJS. Rigorous, autonomous, and passionate about technical challenges, I am looking for a Back-end/Fullstack position. I hold a residency permit allowing me to work freely in France.

espace.title: Espace Web (Personal Project)
desc: Developed a full-stack personal space web application autonomously.
Integrated authentication (JWT), Dark/Light mode, and multi-language support.
Enhanced UI with ReactBit for dynamic components.
Containerized the project with Docker.

rakuten.title: Rakuten France
desc: Migrated and optimized filtering component (250M exports/day): config time reduced from 2min to <30s.
Independently developed two new import supports (XML + JSON) for product sheets, facilitating the integration of 250+ partners.
Integrated AI into data processing.
Migrated frontend from React 15+ to 20+ and JavaScript to TypeScript.
Independently developed an automated migration tool (3 weeks), ensuring integrity of thousands of customer records and reducing manual errors.
Independently developed a discount coupon synchronization program, ensuring reliability of promotions visible to millions of users.
Performed unit and automated tests to ensure code reliability.
Followed specifications and product roadmap to ensure deliverable compliance and deadline adherence.
Organized reporting meetings and daily stand-ups in Agile methodology.

sorbonne.title: Sorbonne Université (E-commerce)
desc: Piloted a collaborative e-shop app with feature flags.
Developed full stack (Backend, Frontend, DB).
Automated Product Line variant generation.

database.title: Université Paris Cité (Database Modeling)
desc: Designed a database to simulate ancient ship navigation.
Used PostgreSQL for design and data management, integrating collaborative modeling tools.
Technologies: PostgreSQL / BOUML / StarUML

quichefs.title: Projet Ouichefs (Linux Kernel)
desc: Developed an improved physical link system for Linux Kernel.
Implemented UUIDs, inter-partition links, and block migration.
